original_text: No! Have only the men go and worship the Lord, since that’s what you have been asking for.” Then Moses and Aaron were driven out of Pharaoh’s presence.
korean_text: 그렇게 하지 말고 너희 장정만 가서 여호와를 섬기라 이것이 너희가 구하는 바니라 이에 그들이 바로 앞에서 쫓겨나니라

sentences.original_text: since that's what you have been asking for
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그것이 당신이 요청해 온 것이기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: were driven out of Pharaoh's presence
